10 SASmarkdown 10.1 Example https://www.ssc.wisc.edu/~hemken/SASworkshops/Markdown/SASmdpackage.html # knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE) require(SASmarkdown) ## Loading required package: SASmarkdown ## sas, saslog, sashtml, and sashtmllog engines ## are now ready to use.
